Reviews.Content: Happy Wow its Fantastic location loved the view from the balcony. excellent Receptionist, speaks English very well, He guided me each n every thing for dinner n lunch too, we stayed there for 4 days with our friends, Daily Cleaning room, Evrything seems so clean. will be sure at the same place in my next vacation with my wife,
Reviews.Author: JackyBarcelona

Reviews.Content: bad attitude I booked this accom after a lot of searching because I wanted a balcony when staying in BARCELONA. In all the adverts including their own website and a lot of the hostel sites it stated room with balcony (although this has now been amended to say room with window or balcony) when we arrived we were allocated this awful room with bars on the winows and no privacy (there was a sink situated outside our window for people to use!)The receptionists was quite unpleasant about the whole problem would not listen etc This spoilt our holiday and def would not stay there again.
Reviews.Author: camers
